video_prompt: Anime character gracefully shifts, movements accentuated by flowing hair and gown ruffles. Expressions subtly change, reflecting a vibrant energy. The background dynamic, transitioning with smoky red and black ethereal currents.
image_prompt: Vibrant anime girl in elaborate red gown with black lace, gold chains, ruby jewels, long light blue hair with red rose pigtails, red eyes, fair skin, black stockings with garter, red bow shoes, dramatic dark ballroom background. Lively, energetic.
refined_video_prompt: A gracefully shifting anime character, their hair and gown ruffles dynamically flowing and rippling. Their expression subtly morphs, conveying vibrant, changing energy. The background continuously transitions, with smoky red and black ethereal currents actively swirling and shifting.
